abstract: Nicholas Diaz of Brooklyn is arrested in stabbing death of his granddaughter's boyfriend Kevin Rivera.
lead_paragraph: Nicolas Diaz, who is charged with manslaughter and criminal possession of a weapon, turned himself in to the police a day after Kevin Rivera, 21, was killed, the authorities said.

headline.main: Brooklyn Man, 81, Charged in Stabbing Death of Granddaughter’s Ex-Boyfriend
headline.print_headline: Brooklyn Man, 81, Is Charged With Manslaughter in Stabbing

snippet: Nicolas Diaz, who is charged with manslaughter and criminal possession of a weapon, turned himself in to the police a day after Kevin Rivera, 21, was killed, the authorities said.
